name: Shield
description: A magical shield of pure force appears in front of the caster, providing a bonus to Defense of 15 + 1 per caster level.  The shield lasts for 3 rounds + 1 round per 3 caster levels.

upgrades.description: With War Shield, your Shield spell now provides an additional 4 points of Defense bonus per War Wizard level.

With Elemental Shield, your Shield spell now is empowered with either Fire, Cold, Electricity, or Acid.  You gain Damage Reduction of 5 plus one per two caster levels against the selected damage type.  In addition, any creature hitting you with a melee attack suffers 1 to 6 plus one per four caster levels damage of the same type.
